Question: TECNOJEST SRL CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Tecnojest SRL

CES 2024

- Tecnojest SRL will be participating in CES 2024 from January 9-12, 2024, showcasing their engineering solutions and engaging with industry professionals and tech visionaries.

- The company will be present at Eureka Park, Hall G, Booth 62201, offering a chance to connect and explore their Italian Tech pavilion.

- Tecnojest SRL will be part of the Italian Trade Agency's presence at CES 2024, highlighting the dedication of Italy to technological development and networking opportunities.

- The company's focus at CES 2024 includes IoT, ICT, and showcasing innovations on a global scale.

- The company aims to impress visitors with their products and services at the world's largest electronics trade show.
